extendedInfo.description: Update your wallpaper with beautiful live pictures of places from all around the world!The images are fetched every 30 minutes from LIVE webcams so you can always see the current view of the chosen location.Explore the world, and enjoy the view!Available cams include:- The Eiffel Tower- Earth viewed from space- New York City- Penguins in Antarctica- The Grand Canyon...and more!We focus on quality: we've handpicked each cam in the list to offer you only the best ones.You can choose a specific cam or select random mode to be surprised at every refresh.A widget is also available if you prefer to keep your current wallpaper.The refresh frequency can be adjusted in the settings.You can also add your own cams to the list.

reviews.title: Best wallpaper
reviews.comment: Best wallpaper app out there! But lately some wallpaper not updating especially Fort Lauderdale.  It\'s my favorite wallpaper. Please fix! Still many not working after updates,  even more than before!  PLEASE FIX!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really Great!
reviews.comment: This is the best live wallpaper I have ever found! Keep up the great work it\'s Great!!  5 + Stars All The Way!!!!  - - Please Don\'t Forget The Updates &  If You Find NEW Cameras!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best live app ever!
reviews.author: Arlene Favazza

reviews.comment: Does not  update when it surpose to every 20sec. Otherwise its great.

reviews.comment: Best thing I have on my phone

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Just a fun app that keeps my background fresh with new images

reviews.title: Nest Cam is the best
reviews.comment: I love watching the storks, then eggs, then babies. So great. Wish there was a way to see it live on my home computer!!!!
reviews.author: wendy holt

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I love this app! It\'s one of my favorites!

reviews.title: Beauty at it\'s best
reviews.comment: Watching the nest cam and seeing these birds come back year after year is just awesome,,,,watching the eggs hatch then seeing the babies grow and leave the nest is a beautiful site,,,I just love these birds.
reviews.author: Laura Rivera

reviews.title: Webcam lover
reviews.comment: Used to spend hours watching webcams when they appeared in the 90\'s. Now I have an app for it on my phone!

reviews.title: Not Bad
reviews.comment: Some good Cam views..Wish there were more live stream.
reviews.author: Rob Mcneil

reviews.title: Not Live Webcam\'s
reviews.comment: Finally. it\'s stable and works great. Nice to see how small the World has become in the last 10 years. Never know which image will pop up next.

reviews.title: Merci pour l\'update
reviews.comment: Une belle update pour une belle appli. Cela fait plaisir!

reviews.title: Great new look
reviews.comment: I really like the new look, so far works great, I was hoping you would fix Time Square, not take it off, another web cam like that would be cool, watching the people was fun.

reviews.title: Fantastic wallpaper

reviews.comment: I liked it better on my g1, because I could swipe sideways and see the whole pic with the cam info. On my Sensation, I can only see the middle. Fix?

reviews.comment: I am really enjoying this app. I\'ve been watching penguins. Have had no problems so far. Galaxy s

reviews.title: Simply awesome
reviews.comment: Have had this app for years - the earth view from space is a gorgeous live wallpaper
